import React from 'react' import { Card, Button, Form } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useState } from 'react'; function StallInfo(props) { const stalls = props.stalls; const [ edit, setEdit ] = useState(false); const [ name, setName ] = useState(""); const [ location, setLocation ] = useState(""); const [ price, setPrice ] = useState(0); const [ taste, setTaste ] = useState(0); const [ comment, setComment ] = useState(""); return ( { edit == false ? <> {stalls.name} {stalls.location} : <>

Edit Stall Info



Stall Name setName(e.target.value)} />

Stall Location setLocation(e.target.value)} />

Price setPrice(e.target.value)} />

Taste setTaste(e.target.value)} />

Comment setComment(e.target.value)} />

} ) } export default StallInfo;
